page.title: 04 TRAFFIC SURVEY - A49
page.content: This road is a{main trunk road} connecting tne North of England with South Wales. It goes right through our Domesday Area. We decided to spend one hour on a typical Friday afternoon in the summer{counting}the amount of {traffic}that uses this very busy road. We counted 320 cars, 35 vans, 66 lorries, 1 coach, 3 motorbikes and 0 pedestrians. Of the cars 100 were red, 23 green, 97 blue, 32 yellow,48 brown, 25 black, 41 white and 58 were other colours. We may have missed some! After traffic spotting we went for a drink and a packet of crisps at a roadside{snack bar}in a lay-by on the A49. Lots of lorry drivers stop there for something to eat.The lady who owns it has got a boy at our school. She opens very early in the morning and closes late at night. We had a nice time.
